name: Spuaro
description:
Inputs for the game are asdf for left and jkl; for right, sadly didn't have time to implement options and remap-able Controls

This game was made by Skunky and Nik using Godot 3.5
2 Levels where created by sombay
The levels where created using Arrow Vortex, and converting the files to our own format.
The music used is from the artist Helblinde, check them out!: https://helblinde.bandcamp.com
